dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
dogpile.cache is a Python caching API which provides a generic interface
to caching backends of any variety.
dependent_to.name: py-dogpile-cache

dependent_to.description: Pythonic file-system for Google Cloud Storage.
dependent_to.name: py-gcsfs

dependent_to.description:
Python-GSSAPI provides both low-level and high level wrappers around the
GSSAPI C libraries.
dependent_to.name: py-gssapi

dependent_to.description: Cloud-native genomic dataframes and batch computing (Python API)
dependent_to.name: py-hail

dependent_to.description: HTTP Request and Response Service
dependent_to.name: py-httpbin

dependent_to.description:
ipdb is the iPython debugger and has many additional features, including
a better interactive debugging experience via colorized output.
dependent_to.name: py-ipdb

dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel

dependent_to.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.
dependent_to.name: py-ipython

dependent_to.description:
A final implementation of JSONPath for Python that aims to be standard
compliant, including arithmetic and binary comparison operators.
dependent_to.name: py-jsonpath-ng

dependent_to.description: A python package for music and audio analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-librosa

dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-mne

dependent_to.description:
MoviePy is a Python module for video editing, which can be used for
basic operations (like cuts, concatenations, title insertions), video
compositing (a.k.a. non-linear editing), video processing, or to create
advanced effects. It can read and write the most common video formats,
including GIF.
dependent_to.name: py-moviepy

dependent_to.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
dependent_to.name: py-networkx

dependent_to.description:
ObsPy is an open-source project dedicated to provide a Python framework
for processing seismological data
dependent_to.name: py-obspy

dependent_to.description: The Parameterization Framework.
dependent_to.name: py-paramz

dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python
dependent_to.name: py-plotly

dependent_to.description:
PyCBC is a software package used to explore astrophysical sources of
gravitational waves. It contains algorithms to analyze gravitational-
wave data from the LIGO and Virgo detectors, detect coalescing compact
binaries, and measure the astrophysical parameters of detected sources.
PyCBC was used in the first direct detection of gravitational waves and
is used in the flagship analysis of LIGO and Virgo data.
dependent_to.name: py-pycbc

dependent_to.description:
PyCUDA gives you easy, Pythonic access to Nvidia's CUDA parallel
computation API
dependent_to.name: py-pycuda

dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for OpenCL.
dependent_to.name: py-pyopencl

dependent_to.description: Easily test your HTTP library against a local copy of httpbin
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-httpbin

dependent_to.description: Ahead of Time compiler for numeric kernels.
dependent_to.name: py-pythran

dependent_to.description: A collection of tools for Python
dependent_to.name: py-pytools

dependent_to.description: Makes it easy to respect rate limits.
dependent_to.name: py-ratelim

dependent_to.description: Easy to use retry decorator.
dependent_to.name: py-retry

dependent_to.description: Database schema migration for SQLAlchemy
dependent_to.name: py-sqlalchemy-migrate

dependent_to.description:
TensorFlow Probability (TFP) is a Python library built on TensorFlow
that makes it easy to combine probabilistic models and deep learning on
modern hardware (TPU, GPU). It's for data scientists, statisticians, ML
researchers, and practitioners who want to encode domain knowledge to
understand data and make predictions.
dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-probability

dependent_to.description: Traitlets Python config system
dependent_to.name: py-traitlets

dependent_to.description: Python Data Validation for Humans.
dependent_to.name: py-validators

description:
The aim of the decorator module it to simplify the usage of decorators
for the average programmer, and to popularize decorators by showing
various non-trivial examples.
name: py-decorator

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
